sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO COMTSTRSMRCVLOGSUMMARY SELECT b.OCCRRNC_DE , b.TRSMRCV_SE_CODE , b.PROVD_INSTT_ID , b.PROVD_SYS_ID , b.PROVD_SVC_ID , b.REQUST_INSTT_ID , b.REQUST_SYS_ID , COUNT(b.OCCRRNC_DE) AS RDCNT , 0 AS ERROR_CO FROM COMTNTRSMRCVLOG b WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT c.OCCRRNC_DE FROM COMTSTRSMRCVLOGSUMMARY c WHERE RTRIM(c.OCCRRNC_DE) = TO_CHAR((SYSDATE - 1), 'YYYYMMDD') ) AND RTRIM(b.OCCRRNC_DE) = TO_CHAR((SYSDATE - 1), 'YYYYMMDD') GROUP BY b.OCCRRNC_DE , b.TRSMRCV_SE_CODE , b.PROVD_INSTT_ID , b.PROVD_SYS_ID , b.PROVD_SVC_ID , b.REQUST_INSTT_ID , b.REQUST_SYS_ID
